project.description: Restore latest eMMC image to the connected BBB. - create a grep sdcard - write latest eMMC image to the grep sdcard - mark function at reversed - start BBB on grep mode - restart BBB on normal more

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo checking Jenkins server echo "Bash version ${BASH_VERSION}..." uname -a ls -ahl lsblk df -h echo user: $(whoami) ping google.com -c 10 sudo apt-get update echo Checking for nessasery packages: sudo apt-get -y -q install sshpass parted mdadm --allow-unauthenticated sudo apt-get -y -q install dirmngr --install-recommends
sudo chmod 777 /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts ssh-keygen -f "/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts" -R $build_machine ssh-keygen -f "/home/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts" -R $build_machine
#ssh-keygen -f "/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts" -R $build_machine
sshpass -p temppwd ssh -t -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no debian@$build_machine <<'ENDSSH' echo enable root access with no password echo temppwd | sudo -S su echo temppwd | sudo -S sed -i -e 's:PermitEmptyPasswords no:PermitEmptyPasswords yes:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i -e 's:#PermitEmptyPasswords:PermitEmptyPasswords:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i -e 's:UsePAM yes:UsePAM no:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i -e 's:PermitRootLogin without-password:PermitRootLogin yes:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i -e 's:PermitRootLogin prohibit-password:PermitRootLogin yes:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sudo sed -i -e 's:#PermitRootLogin:PermitRootLogin:g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sudo passwd -d -u root sudo su
echo patching sshd_config sudo cat <<EOF >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 EOF
ssh-keygen -A || true sudo /etc/init.d/ssh restart service ssh restart echo ssh daemon is restarted ENDSSH
echo root access patching returned
if grep $build_machine /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config then echo /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config was patched already else echo patching /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config cat <<EOF >> /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/config Host $build_machine KexAlgorithms +diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 EOF fi
echo deleting root password in case of chaipcr sshpass -p chaipcr ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine "passwd -d -u root"
if ssh -t -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine <<'ENDSSH'
if grep diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 /etc/ssh/sshd_config then echo sshd_config was patched already else echo patching sshd_config
cat <<EOF>> /etc/ssh/sshd_config KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 EOF ssh-keygen -A || true
sudo service sshd restart sudo service ssh restart /etc/init.d/ssh restart echo device is patched ifconfig fi
exit 0 ENDSSH then echo "-t worked" else echo " trying -tt" ssh -tt -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine <<'ENDSSH'
if grep diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 /etc/ssh/sshd_config then echo sshd_config was patched already else echo patching sshd_config
cat <<EOF >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 EOF ssh-keygen -A || true sudo service sshd restart sudo service ssh restart /etc/init.d/ssh restart echo device is patched ifconfig fi
exit 0 ENDSSH
fi
echo Returned to host. connection check: ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -t root@$build_machine 'exit 0'
if ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -tt root@$build_machine 'exit 0' then echo key is added ok else echo error adding key to known hosts.. retrying.. chmod 777 /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -t root@$build_machine 'exit 0' fi
counter=0 until ssh -tt root@$build_machine 'exit 0' do counter=$(( $counter + 1 )) if [ $counter -gt 10 ] then echo Beaglebone is not available. exit 1 fi
echo waiting for beaglebone to become connectable. sleep 20 done
echo done connection check. sleep 20

build_branch=master
echo Branch param $build_branch clean_build_branch=$build_branch clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"remotes/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"branches/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"refs/heads/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"tags/"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"trunk"} clean_build_branch=${clean_build_branch#"master"} echo Cleaned branch param $clean_build_branch
branch_param= branch_name=
if [ -z $build_branch ] || ! [[ "$build_branch" == *\/* ]] || [ "$build_branch" = "trunk" ] then echo No build branch chosen else branch_name=$clean_build_branch
if [ -z $branch_name ] then echo Master branch chosen.. else branch_param="-b $branch_name" echo Cloning branch and param $branch_name and $branch_param fi fi this_dir=$(pwd) repo_storage=/var/lib/jenkins/userContent/chaibio_repo if [ -e $repo_storage/chaipcr ] then echo found a previous repo copy cd $repo_storage cd chaipcr git pull else echo folder not found, creating the folder and fetching repo: $repo_storage/chaipcr mkdir -p $repo_storage cd $repo_storage git clone $branch_param https://github.com/chaibio/chaipcr.git fi cd $this_dir echo returning to $this_dir if [ -e chaipcr ] then sudo rm -r chaipcr fi if [ -e $repo_storage/chaipcr ] then cp -r $repo_storage/chaipcr . fi
if [ -e chaipcr ] then echo using preloaded copy of repo else git clone $branch_param https://github.com/chaibio/chaipcr.git || exit 1 fi cd chaipcr || exit 1
if [ -z $branch_name ] then echo No build branch chosen else git checkout $branch_name fi

echo "Building ${PROJECT_NAME} - Build # ${BUILD_NUMBER}.. result is at ${BUILD_URL}" echo "Slave Beaglebone at ${build_machine}" echo checking build device echo "Bash version ${BASH_VERSION}..." uname -a ls -ahl lsblk df -h
# debug markers # mark=`date '+%m_%d__%H_%M_%S'`;mkdir -p /root/REST_B4_rootfs_${mark} /perm/REST_B4_perm_${mark} /data/REST_B4_data_${mark};sync
echo processing incomplete installations dpkg --configure -a --force-confdef
mkdir -p /run/chaipcr/ touch /run/chaipcr/exit_all.flag pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill realtime;pkill realtime
echo disable swapping free -m swapoff -a
umount /dev/mmcblk0p* umount /sdcard/*
lsblk if mount | grep mmcblk0 then echo "Error: can't unmount sdcard!" exit 1 fi
echo installing missing packages. apt-get update echo installing parted. apt-get install parted -y -q apt-get install hdparm -y -q
blockdev --flushbufs /dev/mmcblk0 partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 # sfdisk -R /dev/mmcblk0 udevadm trigger --subsystem-match=block; udevadm settle blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 hdparm -z /dev/mmcblk0
if LC_ALL=C sfdisk --force -uS --Linux /dev/mmcblk0 <<-__EOF__ ,,0xe,* __EOF__ then echo SDCard formatted! else echo error formatting SDCard. retrying.. blockdev --flushbufs /dev/mmcblk0 partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 # sfdisk -R /dev/mmcblk0 udevadm trigger --subsystem-match=block; udevadm settle blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 hdparm -z /dev/mmcblk0
dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=51200 count=1000 sync blockdev --flushbufs /dev/mmcblk0 partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 sfdisk -R /dev/mmcblk0 udevadm trigger --subsystem-match=block; udevadm settle blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 hdparm -z /dev/mmcblk0 LC_ALL=C sfdisk --force -uS --Linux /dev/mmcblk0 <<-__EOF__ ,,0xe,* __EOF__ echo formatting /dev/mmcblk0p1 mkfs.ext4 -O ^metadata_csum,^64bit /dev/mmcblk0p1 blockdev --flushbufs /dev/mmcblk0 partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 sfdisk -R /dev/mmcblk0 udevadm trigger --subsystem-match=block; udevadm settle blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 hdparm -z /dev/mmcblk0
if LC_ALL=C sfdisk --force -uS --Linux /dev/mmcblk0 <<-__EOF__ ,,0xe,* __EOF__ then echo SDCard partitioned! else echo error formatting SDCard. # exit 1 fi fi
blockdev --flushbufs /dev/mmcblk0 sudo partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 sudo blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 sfdisk -R /dev/mmcblk0 udevadm trigger --subsystem-match=block; udevadm settle blockdev --rereadpt /dev/mmcblk0 hdparm -z /dev/mmcblk0
echo Formatting..
if command -v mkfs.fat then mkfs.fat /dev/mmcblk0p1 -n CHAIBIO else mkfs.vfat /dev/mmcblk0p1 -n CHAIBIO fi echo SDCard formatted! sync mkdir -p /tmp/grep_sdcard sync if mount /dev/mmcblk0p1 /tmp/grep_sdcard then echo SDCard mounted successfully. else echo Failed to mount SDCard. exit 1 fi
lsblk df -h ulimit -t 1800 export TMOUT=0
echo "Restoring image: $input_image_prefix by restore job build number $BUILD_NUMBER , to this device starting at: " >> ~/restore_history.log date >> ~/restore_history.log
exit 0

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ls echo copying grep sdcard contents scp -r chaipcr/devops/grabimage_sdcard/* root@$build_machine:/tmp/grep_sdcard/ scp -r chaipcr/devops/grabimage_sdcard/uEnv.sdcard.txt root@$build_machine:/tmp/grep_sdcard/uEnv.txt sudo rm -r chaipcr
emmc_image_latest_compressed=${input_image_prefix}_emmc.img.tgz emmc_image_latest_url=$download_prefix/${emmc_image_latest_compressed} emmc_image_latest_tmp_compressed=/tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/${emmc_image_latest_compressed}
emmc_image_latest_tmp_uncompressed_part1=/tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part1.img emmc_image_latest_tmp_uncompressed_part2=/tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part2.img
mkdir -p /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER} echo downloading and restoring $emmc_image_latest_compressed
wget $emmc_image_latest_url -O $emmc_image_latest_tmp_compressed
image_location=$(tar -tf $emmc_image_latest_tmp_compressed | grep eMMC_part2.img) echo full image path $image_location slashes=$(echo $image_location | tr -cd '/' | wc -c) echo slashes are $slashes
tar xfvz $emmc_image_latest_tmp_compressed --strip=$slashes -C /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}
echo latest image downloaded ls -ahl /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part* sync ulimit -t 1800 export TMOUT=0
#rsync -avP #ping -c 500 $build_machine &
#scp -v -o ServerAliveInterval=60 -o ServerAliveCountMax=30
export MAX_RETRIES=5 export RETRY_DELAY=5
echo "first image send"
for i in 1 2 3 4 5 do echo "Attempt $i of $MAX_RETRIES" rsync --no-owner --timeout=30 --partial --append-verify -avzP /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part1.img root@$build_machine:/tmp/grep_sdcard/ && break echo "Transfer failed. Retrying in $RETRY_DELAY seconds..." sleep $RETRY_DELAY done
echo "second image send"
for i in 1 2 3 4 5 do echo "Attempt $i of $MAX_RETRIES" rsync --no-owner --timeout=30 --partial --append-verify -avzP /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part2.img root@$build_machine:/tmp/grep_sdcard/ && break echo "Transfer failed. Retrying in $RETRY_DELAY seconds..." sleep $RETRY_DELAY done
sleep 10 sync #scp -v -o ServerAliveInterval=60 -o ServerAliveCountMax=30 #rsync -avP /tmp/restore/${BUILD_NUMBER}/eMMC_part2.img root@$build_machine:/tmp/grep_sdcard/
rm $emmc_image_latest_tmp_uncompressed_part1 || true rm $emmc_image_latest_tmp_uncompressed_part2 || true rm $emmc_image_latest_tmp_compressed || true
